attributes.action: Ban parents driving their kids to school in Hemel Hempstead
attributes.additional_details: Commuting via personal transport or public transport is being affected in peak times by parents driving their children to school.  Congestion is rife in Hemel Hempstead at peak times. I want to ban parents driving their kids to school.  If the kids are able to walk or use public transport then they should.  I used to walk 2 miles to my school back and forth for 7 years.
